snippet.title: Weyrdlets - Cozy Virtual Pet Trailer
snippet.description:
Weyrdlets is a relaxing, idle desktop pet game with a focus on building a wholesome community. Connect with other players; Send friendly messages, swap stickers, trade cute items and bring a virtual pet onto your desktop or a shared multiplayer space when you need a loving companion!

Wishlist us on Steam today - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2366060/Weyrdlets/
